title: Accessibility
content:
XWiki tries to provide an accessible experience.

In order to do so, we aim at fulfilling the [WCAG 2.2](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG22/) level AA.

We run regularly [automated tests](https://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Testing/WCAGTesting/) and keep track of accessibility issues.

XWiki developers follow our accessibility guidelines ([WIP](https://forum.xwiki.org/t/proposal-accessibility-guidelines/14318)). Any scripting user should try to follow those guidelines too in order to keep creating accessible interfaces.
